## VirtualDom class

虚拟dom

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class VirtualDom 
```

## Remarks

编译后的dom节点，与渲染后的dom节点(RenderedDom)不同

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(tag, key, module)](./nodom3.virtualdom._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>VirtualDom</code> class |
